title: SOLUTION FOR PATCHER KERNEL
body:
Here is a solution to fix the patcher kernel:
Open your folder League of legends.
Open the following:
    -RADS 
    -projects
    -lol_patcher
    -Release
    -Choose the most recent version
    -Deploy
Select the app: lolpatcher
Replace your old launcher by this app.

Now enjoy League of legends :)

PS: Please make sure to leave a comment below if this content helped you.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Thanks a lot ! My League of Legend finnaly works again ! It's the latest update that broke it... And all those guys that says "Launch it as administrator lol" are so dumb, they don't understand that doesn't work for everyone. Anyway thanks and I recommend it.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
